desc: Rainbow fabric woven from Orebi spidersilk. Thin yet flexible, it is a popular crafting component.
lore:
Rainbow-hued and light as a feather, the strange fabric known as "Cloudweave" is spun from the silk of indigenous spiders of Orebus. Though paper-thin, it is surprisingly flexible, making it a popular choice in crafting.

When harvested, the silk itself is translucent and colorless. Only when it is woven into fabric and exposed to light does it take on its signature gradient.
name: Cloudweave
